biotools.summary: C-InterSecture (Computional tool for InterSpecies analysis of genome architecture) - pipeline to cross-species comparison of Hi-C map. C-InterSecture was designed to liftover contacts between species, compare 3-dimensional organization of defined genomic regions, such as TADs, and analyze statistically individual contact frequencies.
